titles.title: Providing for an adjournment of the two Houses.

action.text: Mr. Goss asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 403 - 16 (Roll no. 351).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 7/31/1997--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from August 1 or 2, 1997, until September 3, 1997, and a recess or adjournment of the Senate from July 31 or August 1 or 2, 1997, until September 2, 1997.
